petitions_page.title: Petitions
petitions_page.no_active_petitions: No active petitions at the moment
petitions_page.create_first_petition: Create the first petition to start collecting signatures
petitions_page.author: Author

confirmation_modal.title: Delete petition
confirmation_modal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this petition? This action cannot be undone.

dashboard_page.title: Home
dashboard_page.about_system_text: Welcome to the school voting platform! This system allows students and teachers to participate in votes and create petitions on important school life issues. Every vote counts, and together we can make our school environment better.
dashboard_page.step1_text: Visit the voting section to see all current votes and petitions
dashboard_page.step2_text: Familiarize yourself with the topic, choose an answer, and confirm your choice
dashboard_page.step3_text: Propose your own ideas for solving school issues and gather support

voting_page.title: Voting
voting_page.election_description: Voting for candidates for the position of president of the school government for the 2023-2024 academic year.
voting_page.holiday_theme_description: Vote for the theme of the next school holiday. Choose one of the proposed options.
